name: alexkidd
description: Alex Kidd: The Lost Stars (set 2, unprotected)
story:
A platform game from Sega. Alex Kidd has to travel through all of Miracle World and battle weird monsters in order to save his father from the evil wizard - Ashrah!

In the second stage you can see corpses defecating skulls left and right. Seriously! When inserting a coin, Alex Kidd says "The customer is King!
